description: Plots simple matrices output from 3dNetCorr (*.netcc) and 3dTrackID (*.grid).

input_file.title: Input File
input_file.description: Name of *.netcc or *.grid file with matrices to be plotted

matrices.title: Matrices to Plot
matrices.description: List of matrices to be plotted, identified by their parameter name. If no list is provided, then all matrices in the input file will be plotted.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Output basename for image(s). Note that this can include path information, but the name of each matrix and the file extension will be appended to it.

file_type.title: Output File Type
file_type.description: Filetype, given as extension (e.g., png, jpg). Available filetypes depend slightly on your OS and setup.

dpi.title: DPI
dpi.description: Spatial resolution (dots per inch) of output images.

fs_xticks.title: X-ticks Font Size
fs_xticks.description: Font size of ticks along the x-axis.

fs_yticks.title: Y-ticks Font Size
fs_yticks.description: Font size of ticks along the y-axis.

cbar_n_intervals.title: Colorbar Intervals
cbar_n_intervals.description: Number of intervals on colorbars for enumeration purposes. This controls how many numbers appear along the colorbar (which would be NI +1).

cbar.title: Colorbar
cbar.description: Name of the colorbar to use. The available colormaps can be found online.

cbar_width_perc.title: Colorbar Width Percentage
cbar_width_perc.description: Width of the colorbar as a percentage of the image.

no_colorbar.title: Disable Colorbar
no_colorbar.description: Disable the colorbar in the image.

figsize_x.title: Figure Width
figsize_x.description: Width of the created image in inches.

figsize_y.title: Figure Height
figsize_y.description: Height of the created image in inches.

hold_image.title: Hold Image
hold_image.description: In addition to saving an image file, open the image and keep displaying it until a key is pressed in the terminal.

tight_layout.title: Tight Layout
tight_layout.description: Use matplotlib's tight layout functionality in arranging the plot.

xticks_off.title: Disable X Ticks
xticks_off.description: Don't display labels along the x-axis.

yticks_off.title: Disable Y Ticks
yticks_off.description: Don't display labels along the y-axis.

version.title: Version
version.description: Display the version number of the program.

date.title: Date
date.description: Display the release/editing date of the current version.

help_view.title: Help View
help_view.description: Display help in a separate text editor.
